title: Stage Lv6-D2-S04
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The patient's symptoms are indicative of a specific condition. (professional variant 1)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The patient's symptoms are indicative of a specific condition. (professional variant 1)
Differential diagnosis is required. (professional variant 1)
The treatment plan requires modification. (professional variant 1)
Drug interactions must be considered. (professional variant 1)
The prognosis is expected to be favorable. (professional variant 1)
Contraindications have been identified. (professional variant 1)
Monitoring for adverse effects is necessary. (professional variant 1)
Chronic disease management is crucial. (professional variant 1)
Palliative care is being considered. (professional variant 1)
Prophylactic measures are recommended. (professional variant 1)
